author: WOFL
title: Florida heatwave forces events to change plans | Flipboard
text: Temperatures hit the upper 90s in parts of Central Florida, though in some areas, it may have felt like temperatures were into the 100s. It comes as thousands gather in Daytona Beach for the yearly "Welcome to Rockville" music festival. Due to the heat, changes to made to the Simply IOA Corporate 5K race. It was shortened to 2.4 miles.
